allTimelines.name: Bitotsav Tech Team
allTimelines.title: Web Developer
allTimelines.techStack: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB,Next.js, Tailwind CSS
summaryPoints: Engineered the official website for Bitotsav’25, Jharkhand’s largest college fest, serving 5,000+ participants. Developed a QR-based ticketing and verification system to ensure secure entries. Built major web pages including landing, registration, and dashboard. Managed 200+ technical queries, resulting in a 40% boost in online engagement and 27% increase in participation. Played a key role in ensuring smooth and reliable digital operations throughout the event.

allTimelines.name: IEEE Student Branch, BIT Mesra
allTimelines.title: Technical Intern
allTimelines.techStack: React, Redux, Express, MongoDB,Problem Solving, Data Structures, Algorithms
summaryPoints: Organized and conducted a C++ workshop for over 400+ students and authored questions in the recruitment contest, which saw the participation of 500+ students.

allTimelines.name: Delhi Public School, Bokaro
allTimelines.title: Senior Secondary School
summaryPoints: GPA 10.0/10.0 in CBSE Class 12. Achieved 95% in Mathematics. Secured top 3% in Jee Mains 2023 Actively participated in various extracurricular activities, including being a member of the school’s quiz team and drama club.

allTimelines.name: Saint Joseph's School
summaryPoints: Secured a 96.2% in ICSE. Excelled academically and in extracurriculars, earning the Overall Achievement Award. Was First Runner-Up in the ASISC Regional Quiz (2019) and served on the School Anchoring Committee for 3 years.
